80.description: Expose the HTTP web server port on the docker host, Leave Default of 80
80.label: http80

443.description: Expose the HTTPS and WSS web server port on the docker host, Leave default 443
443.label: https443

/config.description: Choose a Share for UNMS configuration. Eg: create a Share called UNMS-config for this purpose alone.
/config.label: Config Storage

PUID.description: Enter a valid UID to run UNMS with. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PUID.label: UID

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the above UID. It(or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID
